title: Citi Launches Tablet-Based IPO Solution for Issuers
summary: New York – Citi today announced the launch of Citi Issuer Access, an innovative tablet-based suite of capital-markets content designed specifically for issuers involved in the capital formation process. As part of this initiative, issuers will receive dedicated tablet computers pre-loaded with a comprehensive suite of applications, including a real-time issuer view into the order book, access to investor profiles, dynamic roadshow travel and meeting schedule, post-pricing investor relations services and support. Citi Issuer Access will provide a transparent medium for both Citi and the issuer to remain connected on all offering-related matters, foster a closer working relationship and ensure greater transparency to corporate executives throughout the offering process.
tag-1: Citi Launches Tablet-Based IPO Solution for Issuers
tag-3: New York – Citi today announced the launch of Citi Issuer Access, an innovative tablet-based suite of capital-markets content designed specifically for issuers involved in the capital formation process. As part of this initiative, issuers will receive dedicated tablet computers pre-loaded with a comprehensive suite of applications, including a real-time issuer view into the order book, access to investor profiles, dynamic roadshow travel and meeting schedule, post-pricing investor relations services and support. Citi Issuer Access will provide a transparent medium for both Citi and the issuer to remain connected on all offering-related matters, foster a closer working relationship and ensure greater transparency to corporate executives throughout the offering process.
tag-4: "Our approach in any capital-raising initiative is to treat the issuer as a partner and active participant in the offering process. Citi Issuer Access affirms our commitment to transparency and efficient delivery of information to our issuing clients," said John Chirico, Co-Head of Capital Markets Origination Americas at Citi.
tag-5: To bring this innovative capability to market, Citi chose to partner with Ipreo, a top-tier financial services data and technology provider. Ipreo is a leading provider of new issuance software, workflow solutions, market intelligence and data to both capital markets and corporate investor relations professionals.
